name: Bernd Rosemeyer
introduction: Bernd Rosemeyer (October 14, 1909  January 28, 1938) was a German racing driver, known for his appearances in the European Championship, which he won in 1936. He was the husband of woman aviator Elly Beinhorn, whom he first met on the podium at the Brno Masaryk Circuit in 1935. They married on July 13, 1936. Rosemeyer considered 13 to be his lucky number.
